site.notes: Former Indiana State Tuberculosis Sanatorium (est. ~1907), later repurposed for other institutional uses. Now operates as a paranormal investigation and dark tourism venue offering day roam tours, flashlight tours, and paranormal investigations. Third-party operators including Haunted Rooms and Haunted Nights Events host events on site. Site relies heavily on Facebook for current scheduling; keep a separate capture plan for social posts.

evidence.description: Official homepage confirms active dark tourism operation at the former Indiana State Sanatorium.
Official paranormal programming page confirms authorized paid paranormal investigation and day-roam access to the site.
Official history page documents the site's origin as the Indiana State Tuberculosis Sanatorium and subsequent institutional history.
